creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com
text:
The output of ant -help should be kept in synch with what is shown in 
docs/manual/running.html

This patch fixes that (ignore previous patch sent to ant-dev, as I forgot to 
fix one > to be > in the patch)

Created attachment 2875
Patch to update running.html
creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com
